Title: India’s Dhamra LNG terminal to receive Qatari LNG commissioning cargo tomorrow
Description: The Adani Total-operated 5 mtpa Dhamra LNG terminal in India’s eastern state of Odisha is poised to receive an LNG cargo from Qatar tomorrow, with this seen kicking off the start of commissioning operations at the country’s newest LNG receiving facility.
Author: CK

Title: Venture Global delays commercial operations start at Calcasieu Pass due to “extensive repairs”
Description: US LNG producer Venture Global has delayed the start of commercial operations at its 10 mtpa Calcasieu Pass LNG plant in Louisiana due to ‘extensive repairs’ needed on the plant’s heat recovery steam generators, indefinitely lengthening its term buyers’ wait to receive their contracted cargoes and potentially increasing their import costs if they seek alternative supplies in the meantime.
Author: CK
